lyrics:
7 contributorsgood girl lyricschorus
you just lost a good girl good girl good girl
a good girl you lost today
from such a good thing good girl good girl
from such a good thing you walked away

verse 1
thought i was your guiding light your angel
well i didnt know
was prepared to sacrifice my halo
i was buggin out

prechorus
everybody
would come to me
tellin me
the things they seen
your girlfriend
live for the limelights
but thats alright
if thats what you like

chorus
you just lost a good girl good girl good girl
a good girl you lost today
from such a good thing good girl good girl
from such a good thing you walked away
you walked away
you might also likeverse 2
how could i mistake us having sex with making love
its sad ill never know
how could i believe you knew what real love was
its real as summer snow

prechorus
everybody
would come to me
tellin me
the things they seen
your girlfriend
live for the limelights
but thats alright
if thats what you like

chorus
you just lost a good girl oh oh good girl good girl
a good girl you lost today
from such a good thing good girl good girl
from such a good thing you walked away

bridge
i reminisce to that moment
you held me close you held me close
said we could rewrite history
so how could you blow it
now our song has no notes no notes
so what will the angels sing ah
i guess nothing
verse 3
thought i was over my lifes biggest hurdle
but oh no no no
it seems destinys arrangements circles
thats how it goes

prechorus
everybody everybody
would come to me come to me
tellin me tellin me
the things they seen things they seen
your girlfriend
who lives for the limelight limelights
thats alright
if thats what you like

chorus
you just lost a good girl good girl good girl oh
a good girl you lost today you lost today
from such a good thing good girl good girl
from such a good thing you walked away you walked away
you just lost a good girl not really a jealous girl good girl good girl
a good girl you lost today my heart opened doors to a place you could walk through
from such a good thing more precious than any girl good girl good girl
from such a good thing you walked away truly your best friend someone that you can talk to
you just lost a good girl
outro
so im single nowembed
